item.title: Unsteam - Playing Co-op with Patched Games
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Unsteam - Playing Co-op with Patched Games

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

üéÆ Introduction to Unsteam

Unsteam is a Steam emulator that allows patched games to function with online multiplayer features. It simulates the Steam API to enable cooperation between players with unofficial versions.

üí° Important note: Unsteam works ONLY on games with Steam protection, nothing else. So you can’t patch Black Myth Wukong because Denuvo anti-cheat is present, same for FC 25 with EA, etc. Don’t complain if it doesn’t work when you try to patch these games.

üîß Step 1: Obtaining Files

Game Downloads 

# You need to create an account to download content
https://cs.rin.ru/forum/viewforum.php?f=22
  1. Access the cs.rin.ru forum
  2. Download your desired game. If it’s not available, go to https://cs.rin.ru/forum/viewforum.php?f=10, search for your desired game in CSF format (CSF = Clean Steam Files) on your game’s page.

Downloading Unsteam 

# You need to create an account to download content
https://cs.rin.ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=134707
  1. Download the latest version of Unsteam
  2. Extract the archive to a folder EXCLUDED FROM WINDOWS DEFENDER. Follow this tutorial if you don’t know how: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BonLkFNnO9w

üîç Step 2: Finding Game Information

Using SteamDB 

# Reference site
https://steamdb.info/
  1. Access SteamDB.info
  2. Search for your game by name
  3. Note the following information:
    • AppID of the main game
    • AppID of DLCs (if present)
    • Name of DLCs

Example for God of War 

Game name: God of War
Main AppID: 1593500
DLC example: Digital Deluxe Edition (AppID: 1593501)

‚öôÔ∏è Step 3: Configuring Unsteam

Unsteam File Structure 

Unsteam/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe    # Main launcher
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_x64.dll          # Emulation library
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini              # Configuration file

Configuring the unsteam.ini file

Create or modify the unsteam.ini file. It will auto-generate on first launch, and here’s its configuration:

[loader]
exe_file=
dll_file=unsteam_x64.dll

[game]
real_app_id=387990
fake_app_id=480
language=english
beta_name=public
saves_path=saves

[dlcs]
appid1=DLC Name
appid2=DLC Name

Detailed Parameter Explanation

[loader] Section 

exe_file=GoW.exe                # Path to your game's EXE
dll_file=unsteam_x64.dll       # Unsteam DLL (don't modify)

[game] Section 

real_app_id=1593500            # Real game AppID (from SteamDB)
fake_app_id=480                # Fake AppID (leave 480 by default)
language=english               # Game language (english/french/german/etc.)
beta_name=public               # Beta version (leave "public")
saves_path=saves               # Save folder

[dlcs] Section 

1593501=Digital Deluxe Edition # AppID=DLC Name
1593502=Season Pass            # AppID=DLC Name (example)

üìÅ Step 4: Installation and Configuration

File Placement 

YourGame/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ GoW.exe                    # Game executable
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe     # ‚Üê Copy this file here
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_x64.dll           # ‚Üê Copy this file here
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini               # ‚Üê Create this file here
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ saves/                    # Save folder (auto-created)

Example Configuration for God of War 

[loader]
exe_file=GoW.exe
dll_file=unsteam_x64.dll

[game]
real_app_id=1593500
fake_app_id=480
language=english
beta_name=public
saves_path=saves

[dlcs]
1593501=Digital Deluxe Upgrade

üöÄ Step 5: Launching the Game

Launch Procedure

  1. Launch Steam first
  2. Log in to your Steam account
  3. Navigate to your game folder
  4. Execute unsteam_loader_x64.exe (NOT the game’s .exe)
  5. Wait for loading

Verifying Functionality 

‚úÖ Steam overlay visible
‚úÖ Steam profile displayed in game
‚úÖ Multiplayer functions active
‚úÖ Steam achievements unlocked (optional)

üåê Step 6: Co-op Gaming

Connecting with Friends

  1. Ensure your friends are also using Unsteam
  2. Verify you have the same AppID configured
  3. Launch the game simultaneously
  4. Use normal multiplayer functions

üîß Common Troubleshooting

Frequent Problems

Game Won’t Launch 

‚ùå Problem: "Failed to load game"
‚úÖ Solution: Check the exe_file= path in unsteam.ini

Steam Overlay Missing 

‚ùå Problem: No Steam overlay
‚úÖ Solution: Launch Steam BEFORE unsteam_loader_x64.exe

Multiplayer Not Working 

‚ùå Problem: Can't join friends
‚úÖ Solution: Verify everyone uses the same real_app_id. If it still doesn't work,
online functionality simply isn't supported

DLL Error 

‚ùå Problem: "unsteam_x64.dll not found"
‚úÖ Solution: Place the DLL in the same folder as the EXE

Game Still Won’t Launch 

‚ùå Problem: "Game won't launch even after doing all this?"
‚úÖ Solution: Sometimes a game doesn't only have Steam protection. As mentioned at the beginning,
if the game has protection OTHER than Steam, like Denuvo, BattleEye, etc., then it's impossible.

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Precautions

Steam Account Security

  • DON’T USE your main Steam account
  • Create a secondary account if necessary
  • Avoid games with aggressive anti-cheat

Game Compatibility 

‚úÖ Compatible: Steam coop/multiplayer games
‚úÖ Compatible: Games with Steam Workshop
‚ùå Incompatible: Games with EAC/BattlEye
‚ùå Incompatible: Games requiring Steam DRM

Updates 

Frequency: Check Unsteam updates monthly
Source: cs.rin.ru (official forum)
Version: Always use the latest stable version

Multi-Game Configuration 

Create a folder per game with its own configuration:
Games/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ GoW/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini (GoW config)
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Elden Ring/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini (Elden Ring config)
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe

üí° Final tip: Always test with free games or games you legally own before using with other titles. Co-op works better with stable connections and identical configurations between players.
